en.description: Experience muscle relaxation through hot stone therapy.

en.description: Reconnect with nature through a guided meditation walk.

en.description: A strong pressure massage to relieve deep muscle tension.

en.description: Soothing essential oil therapy to calm your senses.

en.description: A wellness class focused on breathing and stretching exercises.

en.description: Taste a variety of detoxifying and healthy juices.

en.title: Wellness Coaching Session
en.description: One-on-one session with a certified wellness coach.

en.title: Sound Healing Therapy
en.description: Experience emotional healing with sound frequencies.

en.title: Sauna & Steam Experience
en.description: Revitalize yourself with sauna and steam room access.
